info.title: EdiZon-Overlay
info.author: proferabg, WerWolv
info.description: Toggle cheats in a convenient overlay.
info.details: EdiZon-Overlay is a Tesla-Menu overlay that enabled you to toggle cheats without ever having to leave the game. It also provides useful stats like temperatures, clock speeds, local IP address, and Wi-Fi signal strength.

changelog:
v1.0.13 Version v1.0.13 Changelog - gdbstub bug fix
v1.0.12 Version v1.0.12 Changelog - Added support for HOS 21.0.0 - Updated libultrahand to v2.1.5
v1.0.11 Version v1.0.11 Changelog - Updated libultrahand to v2.1.4
1.0.10 Special thanks to @ppkantorski for fixing a few bugs with libultrahand Updated libultrahand (fixes #33) 1.0.9 Special thanks to @ppkantorski for this update! Updated libnx. Now utilizing libtesla (Ultrahand) & libultra. Custom wallpaper / theme support. Users can override the system wallpaper / theme with sdmc:/config/edizon/wallpaper.rgba and sdmc:/config/edizon/theme.ini. Faster opening / game detection. Fix for local IP calls. Temperature readings are now done through i2c. 1.0.8 Updated libnx Fixed temperature rendering Added Enabling Cheats by Default on Overlay Open 1.0.7 Squashed some more crashing issues! Fixed mismatched cheats when hiding and showing the overlay. Added a way to disable submenu logic for those who requested it. 1.0.6 Using latest libnx and libtesla which fixes most crashes.
